sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A thanksgiving-sermon, preached before the honourable House of Commons at Westminster, April 9. 1644. For the happie and seasonable victory of Sir Will. Waller and Sir Will. Balfore, &c. over Sir Ralph Hopton and his forces raised against the Parliament. / By Obadiah Sedgwick B.D. and Pastour at Coggeshall in Essex. Published by order of the House of Commons. Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.
[4], 32 p.
Printed by J. R. for Samuel Gellibrand, and are to be sold at his shop at the brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Balfore, &c. over Sir Ralph Hopton and his forces raised against the Parliament. / By Obadiah Sedgwick B.D. and Pastour at Coggeshall in Essex. Published by order of the House of Commons. Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.
[4], 32 p.
Printed by J. R. for Samuel Gellibrand, and are to be sold at his shop at the brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1644.
